info.name: Smoky Chicken Salad
info.description:
Served with Thousand Island Dressing - Serves 1
Smoky chicken seasoned with flavouful spices, this salad bowl is not your usual one. Calories (Kcals): 387, Carbs (Gms): 27, Proteins (Gms): 14, Fats (Gms): 26

info.name: Lebanese Chicken Salad
info.description:
Served with Lebeneh Dressing - Serves 1
Fresh Veggies topped with Tender, cooked chicken seasoned with flavouful spices is a classic white chicken salad for your everyday meals. Calories (Kcals)- 331, Carbs (Gms)- 20, Proteins (Gms)-16, Fats (Gms)- 22

info.name: Egg Greek salad
info.description:
Served with Lebeneh Dressing, Serves 1
This Egg Greek salad is a delicious combination of lettuce, green capsicum, tomatoes, corn, olives, and jalapenos, tossed in herbs and chili. It is topped with Feta Cheese and 2 eggs, making it a filling salad for your meal.

info.name: Garden Fresh Veg Salad
info.description:
Served with Thousand Island Dressing, Serves 1
Experience the freshness of veggies with lettuce, green capsicum, tomatoes, corn, olives, and jalapenos tossed in herbs and chili and topped with falafel shots.

info.name: Veg Greek Salad
info.description:
Served with Lebeneh Dressing, Serves 1
A classic veggie salad made with lettuce, green capsicum, tomatoes, corn, olives, and jalapenos tossed in herbs and chili. Topped with Feta Cheese, making this the perfect salad for your meal. Calories (Kcals) 222, Carbs (Gms) 16, Proteins (Gms) 8, Fats (Gms) 15

info.name: Butter Chicken Rice Bowl with Seekh Kebab
info.description: Butter makes everything better, but chicken makes everything best! Creamy butter chicken served with rice, salad and delicious chicken seekh. Calories (Kcals): 1085, Carbs (Gms): 136, Proteins (Gms): 52, Fats (Gms): 38

choices.name: Potato Chilli Shots with Mayo Dip

info.name: Palak Chicken Rice Bowl with Chicken Kebab
info.description: Chicken power like no other. Tender chicken in creamy palak gravy served with rice, salad and melt-in-mouth Chicken Haleem Kebab. Calories (Kcals) 904, Carbs (Gms) 87, Proteins (Gms) 43, Fats (Gms) 44

choices.name: Potato Chilli Shots with Mayo Dip

info.name: Dal Makhni Rice Bowl with Dahi Kebab
info.description: Best of both the worlds in a bowl. Creamy dal makhani served with rice, salad and soft dahi kebabs. Calories (Kcals) 765, Carbs (Gms) 101, Proteins (Gms) 24, Fats (Gms) 31

choices.name: Potato Chilli Shots with Mayo Dip

info.name: Skimmed Mint Buttermilk
info.description: Mildly spiced Indian buttermilk with the freshness of mint.

info.name: Masala Lemonade (200 mL)
info.description: A refreshing classic drink with combined goodness of fresh lime, himalayan pink salt & infused spices.

info.name: Tender Coconut Water (200 mL)
info.description: Every athlete's go-to natural energy drink, Coconut water (in collaboration with Raw Pressery) is a complete win-win for your everyday rehydration needs.

info.name: Jeera Masala Soda (350 mL)
info.description: Aerated drink with the added zing of jeera and masala, a perfect accompaniment to your meal.

info.name: Cold Coffee (200 mL)
info.description: Guaranteed to satisfy your craving for caffeine and coolness, this refreshing, ready-to-drink, cold coffee is an all time favourite.

info.name: Lemon Ice Tea (250 mL)
info.description: Sip on this refreshing drink for a citrusy lemon punch, infused with brewed tea. This iced tea is a perfect way to re-energize you anytime of the day!
